Generally the generics are just as good.

Posts.Content: Dr Walsh talks about hormone therapy and quality of life. I like to surf and the Lupron made it a lot more difficult. I had no energy and I gained 20 lbs. Like you I also like to bike and I walk a lot. My RO wanted me on Lupron 2 years but I stopped after one year. Since the cancer will eventually become castrate resistant I'm not sure I want to go back on ADT. We'll see what happens. Tom
